 2017-01112017-02-13,  HC,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Food Irradiation)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (FOOD IRRADIATION) in order to permit the sale of irradiated fresh and frozen raw ground beef products in Canada for the purpose of reducing its bacterial count and improving its safety.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0016 Publication Date: 2017-02-22

subject: Regulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Food Irradiation)
precis: Regulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (FOOD IRRADIATION) in order to permit the sale of irradiated fresh and frozen raw ground beef products in Canada for the purpose of reducing its bacterial count and improving its safety.
